# mesh

**Instance Property**

An array that describes the mesh to render.

## Declaration

```swift
var mesh: [Any] { get set }
```

## Discussion

Specify the mesh as an array of line segments. Each line segment is stored as a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIVector] instance that describes the line as a start point and an end point.

## Instance Properties

- **color**: The color of the rendered mesh.
- **width**: The width of the effect.
